overview:
Gavin Aitken is a technologist and entrepreneur. With a background in computer engineering Gavin has created a successful start to his career by heading up all technology efforts at Neverblue Inc.

Neverblue was formed in the style of most online business, as an internet start-up. Gavin joined the company as employee #10. With rapid growth came the need for a strong technology platform to create a competitive edge. Working with the founders, Gavin formed a strong technology team and built an industry leading affiliate network platform. While growing the affiliate network Neverblue has also helped create multiple internal subsidiaries. Gavin was tasked with managing the technical growth of the larger affiliate network, while simultaneously building these small businesses. The success of these logistical and technical challenges can be authenticated by the financial achievement of the Neverblue business. Neverblue is now a 90 person operation and a top 5 global CPA affiliate network.
